uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs

Class AbstractDateInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.AbstractInput<V>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.ParseAbstractInput<java.util.Date>
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.AbstractDateInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundedInput<java.util.Date>, FormatHintInput, HTML5Input, Input<java.util.Date>, LengthInput<java.util.Date>, OptionalInput, ParseInput<java.util.Date>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateInput, TimeStampInput

    public abstract class AbstractDateInput
extends ParseAbstractInput<java.util.Date>
implements BoundedInput<java.util.Date>, FormatHintInput
    A abstract superclass for text Inputs that parse to java Date objects. sub-classes may be constrained to generate values that are constrained to day/hour/min boundaries. This class uses a series of DateFormats applied in turn so as to support multiple formats the first format should be the one compatible with the format defined in the standard for the corresponding Html5 input. However getHintIndex() specifies the format that should be suggested to a user when defaulting to a text input
    Author:
    spb
